Package com.semedy.reasoner.reasoning.processes

Class UnbufferedStore

java.lang.Object
com.semedy.reasoner.reasoning.processes.ProcessImp
com.semedy.reasoner.reasoning.processes.UnbufferedStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
Receiver, Process, Store
Direct Known Subclasses:
BufferedStore, TopDownUnbufferedStore
public class UnbufferedStore extends ProcessImp implements Store
A store with an unbuffered input.
Used between the rule body operators
Author:
angele

      public void readAccessBegin(Set<Integer> tickets, boolean lock)
      Description copied from interface: Store
      Reading of the store by an operator starts.
      Every reading is uniquely identified by a ticket.
      Lock indicates that ressources must be locked
